title: Game Knight
text: This is a full stack MERN scheduling app that helps users browse or host - virtual or in-person game events.

title: CulTourist
text: This full CRUD-based application takes in user comments about the culture, scams, slang, and nuances of a particular country to help future travelers be informed while abroad.

title: Google Books React App
text: This is a full stack MERN application that uses the Google Books API to help users search for, learn about, save or delete books they've pinned.

title: Eat-Da-Burger App
text: This is burger logger app with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!)

title: Employee Team Roster
text: This is a team generator command line app that prompts the user to create a team roster and prints to a new website.

title: Fitness Tracker
text: This is a PWA workout tracker app that utilizes MongoDB and routes with Express.
